schema.description: The response object returned from a SendOfferToInterestedBuyers request.

offers.description: The offers container returns a list of the offers sent to buyers who have shown an interest in listings included in the offer.

This method evaluates a seller's current listings and returns the set of IDs tha... - 400
This method evaluates a seller's current listings and returns the set of IDs tha... - 204
This method evaluates a seller's current listings and returns the set of IDs tha... (application/json)

schema.description: This complex type defines a collection of listings that are eligible for an offer to a buyer.

eligibleItems.description: A list of items that are eligible for a seller-initiated offer to a buyer. Each element in the list contains the listing ID of a listed item. These IDs represent the listings for which buyers have shown an interest.

href.description: The URI of the current page of results from the result set.

limit.description: The number of items returned on a single page from the result set. This value can be set in the request with the limit query parameter.

next.description: The URI for the following page of results. This value is returned only if there is an additional page of results to display from the result set. Max length: 2048

offset.description: The number of results skipped in the result set before listing the first returned result. This value can be set in the request with the offset query parameter. Note: The items in a paginated result set use a zero-based list where the first item in the list has an offset of 0.

prev.description: The URI for the preceding page of results. This value is returned only if there is a previous page of results to display from the result set. Max length: 2048

total.description: The total number of items retrieved in the result set. If no items match the search criteria, the server returns the HTTP status code 204 No Content.
